content:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Under the Freedom of Information Act I would like to request the following information:
•	The annual values in pounds of government subsidies spent on each of the bus routes in your authority, for the year of 2023.  If 2023 is not available then please provide the most recently available data.
•	Annual passenger numbers for all of the bus routes in your authority, for the year of 2023.  If 2023 is not available then please provide the most recently available data.
Please provide such data electronically. If possible, please provide it as a spreadsheet. If that is not possible, please provide it in a table if you can.
Regards,
Tim

Hi SYMCA
Please process this request as the responsible public authority.
Kind regards
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [Sheffield City Council request email]

Dear Tim
Thank you for your email, this has been sent on to South Yorkshire Mayoral
Combined Authority to provide a response.
I am treating your correspondence as a request for information under the
Freedom of Information Act 2000. You should expect to receive a further
reply from us within 20 working days from the day when your request was
originally received.
If you have any queries about this request do not hesitate to contact us
quoting reference number FOI2024/39.
Yours sincerely,
Kyle Hopkins
Information Governance Officer
[1]www.southyorkshire-ca.gov.uk
South Yorkshire Mayoral Combined Authority Executive
11 Broad Street West, Sheffield, S1 2BQ
[2]twitter icon  [3]fb icon [4]linkedin Icon
show quoted sections

Dear Information Requests,
I should have received a response by 27 March. What has happened? Please can this be urgently expedited?
Yours sincerely,
BBC England Data Unit

Thank you for your email
Receipt of your email will be sent to you shortly.
Kind Regards
SYMCA Governance Team

Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please pass this on to the person who conducts Freedom of Information reviews.
I am writing to request an internal review of Sheffield City Council's handling of my FOI request 'Bus subsidy FOI'.
It hasn't been answered.
Yours faithfully,
BBC England Data Unit
